t: AN EXPERT’S GUIDE TO SPONSORED BRAND VIDEO ON AMAZON | PATTERN BLOG
s: For a strong Sponsored Brand Video, follow an Introduce, Inspire and Educate, Call-to-Action format. First, introduce your product. Second, use visuals and text call-outs to both inspire and educate the audience about the product.
